briefTitle: Art Therapy Intervention for Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: A Mixed Methods Approach to Evaluating How Art Therapy Can Benefit Women Recently Diagnosed With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Quality of Life (emotional distress, physical symptoms,self-efficacy and well-being)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Any woman 18-years or older
2. Stage I to III breast cancer (first time diagnosis)
3. Minimum of 6 weeks Post Operative status
